feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
